title: My Account Was Banned for Violating There Terms Of Use And Conditions
body: One night I played a match of ARAM with my friend, we decided to call it a night because I had work in the morning. I wake up go to work didn't have time for a match so I waited till I finished. I got home from work checked my phone and I saw that I had gotten an email from riot saying that my account had been banned until February next year for something that I didn't do (in fact I don't even know what it was that they think I did) pls help me I sent in a ticket but I haven't heard anything from them. TBH I love this game I've made a couple of IRL friends from this game idc if I sound nerdy its just my opinion on the game I do have a lot of skins on this game so that kind of makes me annoyed that this has happened PLEASE HELP ME!!!

replies.body:
Hey there,

You should've received the reasoning for your suspension in your email, if you haven't received this email or are unable to locate it then I would recommend continuing to follow up with your support ticket that you have open.

Please note: Support is currently backlogged and responses may take longer than usual to receive, please avoid "Bumping" your ticket or adding information unless requested as this may push you to the back of the ticket queue.
ok i just got the email it was a chargeback apparently they gave me 55 dollars back and I have to pay them back in full but how much do I pay them back and why I'm so confused ---__--

I hadn't received any information as to why my account was banned and I wont say anything until they reply to me so I don't bump my ticket to the back of the queue its just frustrating :( thankyou for replying
